summary: Uses CK to change all males in Whiterun to females, and then to visually enhance all females to characters with ApachiiSkyHair and Visually appealing faces.
descriptionHtml:
So, I'm not new to modding, but I am new to this website, as well as the Nexus community, so I'd like to upload one of the newer mods that I'm working on for the enjoyment of the community.

A long while back, I realized that it would be genuinely wonderful if all characters in Skyrim were 100% female. I then decided that I would love to take on this task, as well as the task of getting voice-overs to modify the sounds that came out of the female-turned character's mouths. I realize that this project is a long and arduous task, but I am perfectly willing to modify each and every humanoid NPC, be it a Bandit, Jarl, Commoner, or dead body, into a female version of said character. I've even decided that I am going to take it one step farther and implement the usage of ApachiiSkyHair and attach that to each and every character as well.

I'm starting with Whiterun, and you can expect a total of 3 versions of this to come out of what I am producing here.

1. All Female with ASH
2. All Female with ASH - No Orcs, Elves, Argonians, or Kajiit.
3. All Female Vanilla (That is to say, No Apachii Skyhair requirement)

You can expect me to work on the mod quickly, but the creation of the voice-over aspect will take me a larger, more lengthy amount of time.

Until it's official release in two weeks or so, I will be uploading a single character's file for a little sneak peek at what the game will end up looking like. I will update this entire post at the time of full release.
author: A-T-
